channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- Commerce Webservices 2.0 (Swagger UI)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- Commerce Webservices 2.0 (Swagger UI)

item.title: CVE-2022-41266|2024-08-03T12:42:44.067Z -- sap -- commerce%20webservices%202.0%20%28swagger%20ui%29
item.description: Due to a lack of proper input validation, SAP Commerce Webservices 2.0 (Swagger UI) - versions 1905, 2005, 2105, 2011, 2205, allows malicious inputs from untrusted sources, which can be leveraged by an attacker to execute a DOM Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attack. Â As a result, an attacker may be able to steal user tokens and achieve a full account takeover including access to administrative tools in SAP Commerce.
